page.title: 15RELIGION AND CHURCHES
page.content:
In our area there are five churches.
These are {Craigyhill Presbyterian, {All Saints Church, {Craigyhill Methodist, {Roman Catholic Chapel, {Gospel Hall. { Craigyhill Methodist and Presbyterian Churches are attended by large numbers of{Protestant}people from the estates of Craigyhill and Antiville. While the Presbyterian Church has most members & has other Churches in the town the old Church of St.Cedma is centuries older. Like All Saints it is the Church of Ireland. {John Wesley}who founded the Methodist church once came to Larne. There is a Roman Catholic Church and numerous smaller denominations. { { Fiona Adams
